name: Vishal Tatar
desc: Learning should not be restrictive, learning should always focus on the overall development of a child. It should be fun and engaging and at the same time, help a child explore his innovativeness. Dakshya Nepal plans on becoming the largest digital educator of Nepal and we are here to join hands with you to be the best.
